findfounders.instruction:
Search for the company name mentioned in the attachment in <http://crunchbase.com> and look for name of the founders.
If the copmany is not found in crunchbase.com, try to research <http://linkedin.com> and find out who is the founder of that company.

maleorfem.instruction: Is this person Male of Female?

gettimezone.instruction: 'Search google for the timezone of the given city'

localtime.instruction: 'Search google for "current time in ..." for the given place'
